about.mainTitle:
I'm Ritesh Rana,
Full Stack Developer & Cloud Architect
from the vibrant lands of India.
about.description: I have rich experience in web development & building scalable applications. Also I am good at React, Node.js, AWS, and modern web technologies. I love to talk with you about our unique approach. Feel free to contact me writing an email with your project idea.

aitools.title: AI-Powered Development Tools

aitools.augment: VS Code - Applied for real-time debugging assistance, test case suggestions, and performance improvements.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Where I've Worked
experience.description: Here's a brief rundown of my most recent experiences.

gfy.name: GFY â€“ GoFarmYourself
gfy.desc1: Developed and deployed a cross-platform React Native mobile app using Expo EAS, integrated with optimized build profiles and native components
gfy.desc2: Created a scalable Next.js web application powered by AWS Amplify Gen 2, AppSync (GraphQL APIs), Lambda functions, and DynamoDB
gfy.desc3: Focused on performance and user experience through efficient state management, lazy data loading, native animations, and cloud-based deployment pipelines

bharee.name: Bharee
bharee.desc1: Developed a scalable web application for B2B water purification infrastructure and distribution
bharee.desc2: Built frontend using React JS and SCSS, and backend with Node JS, REST APIs, and MongoDB
bharee.desc3: Ensured responsive UI and seamless module integration

totam.name: Totam
totam.desc1: Developed a multi-tenant web application using the .NET Framework for hiring and interview management
totam.desc2: Implemented features to enhance communication between managers and candidates
totam.desc3: Focused on modular architecture and access control

ementor.name: Ementor
ementor.desc1: Built a cross-platform application for Windows, Android, iOS, and macOS using .NET MAUI Blazor
ementor.desc2: Worked as a full stack developer using .NET MAUI for frontend and Node JS with MongoDB for backend
ementor.desc3: Designed responsive interfaces and optimized database workflows

lusio.name: Lusio
lusio.desc1: Developed a gaming platform interface using Next JS
lusio.desc2: Worked as a frontend developer, focusing on component-based UI and performance

theoceann.desc1: Maritime-focused project with front-end development using React JS

rocketstreets.desc1: Developed a stock market-focused web application with dynamic data rendering

interntrack.name: InternTrack
interntrack.desc1: Developed the frontend using React.js, ensuring a responsive and intuitive user interface

interntrack.desc3: Supported team in ensuring cross-browser compatibility and enhancing product quality through QA processes

marsdevs.resp1: Spearheaded full-stack development for live web and mobile applications in a collaborative Agile environment
marsdevs.resp2: Built and maintained applications using React JS, React Native, Next JS, Node JS, Python and TypeScript
marsdevs.resp3: Designed and integrated AWS-based serverless architecture using AppSync, Lambda Functions, and related services
marsdevs.resp4: Ensured high code quality through modular coding practices, version control, and performance optimization

eteam.name: Eteam Infoservices Pvt. Ltd
eteam.resp1: Delivered scalable full-stack solutions by leading the design, development, and deployment of enterprise-level applications

eteam.resp3: Designed front-end/back-end architecture and implemented database schemas with clear application flowcharts
